column4: anyone know how to enable Ubuntu to accept VNC connections at the login screen? or how to disable the login screen so it boots straight to desktop?
thanks Mabus and mjr. are the settings to autologin in the ubuntuguide?
okay, mjr, thanks, I'll have a play around with it.
I have a kind of "auto-login" ... 30 sec. after gdm apper , it will boot with my account
